G6 是一个简单、易用、完备的图可视化引擎，它在高定制能力的基础上，提供了一系列: G6 is graph visualization engine with simplicity and convenience. Based on the ability of customize, it provides a set of elegant graph visualization solutions, and helps developers to build up applications for graph visualization, graph analysis, and graph editor.
G6 是一个专注于关系数据的、完备的图可视化引擎: G6 is a complete graph visualization engine, which focuses on relational data
扎根实际具体业务场景、结合业界领先成果，沉淀顶尖解决方案: According to practical bussiness scenarios, we found out the top solutions
精心设计的简单、灵活、高可拓展的接口，满足你的无限创意: Well-designed simple, flexible, and extendable intefaces will satisfy your infinite originality
基于 G6 的关系时序分析应用: Dynamic Relationships Analysis Powered by G6
基于 G6 的关系时序分析应用，解决应急过程中流程、影响面、应急预案等一系列应急: This is an application for dynamic relationships analysis based on G6, which helps people deal with the flow, influence, and find out solutions to avoid losses and faults.
基于 G6 的图分析应用: Graph Analysis App Powered by G6
社交网络分析是图可视化中一个重要的应用场景。随着社交网络越来越流行，人与人、人与: Social network is an important scenario in graph visualization. The relationships become complicate with the development of social network. Graph visualization and analysis do well on these complex cases.
基于 G6 的动态决策树: Interactive Decision Graph Powered by G6
基于 G6 实现的动态决策树，辅助用户寻找合适的可视化方式。它展示了 G6 强大: It is an interactive graph for users to find out an appropriate visualization method for their requirements. The demo shows the powerful custom node and animation ability of G6.
按下 Esc 键退出拉索选择模式: Press Esc to Exit the Lasso Select Mode
按住 SHIFT 键并点选两个节点作为路径起终点: Press SHIFT and Select Two Nodes as Ends of the Path
按下 Esc 键退出当前模式: Press Esc to Exit the Mode
选择有且仅有两个节点作为端点，并点击 Find Path 按钮: Select Only Two Nodes as Ends and Click `Find Path`
输入需要搜索的节点 ID，并点击 Submit 按钮: Input the ID of the Interested Node and Click `Submit`
输入 ID 搜索节点: Input the ID to Search Node
按下 Esc 键退出鱼眼放大镜: Press Esc to Exit the Fisheye Mode
这是一个原数据中的真实节点: It is a real node of source data
至少一个端点是聚合节点: At least one end node is an aggregated node
两个端点都是真实节点: Both end nodes are real nodes
节点中间的数字代表该聚类所含的节点数量:
The number on the node indicates the real nodes number 
of this cluster
相较于上一次结果，右上方小绿点标记了\n本次更新结果中新增的聚合节点或真实节点:
The green dot on the right-top of the node indicates that 
the node is newly added compared to last result
